Package suncertify.db

Interface Summary
DataRow Specifies constants for the data row and element positions in the data array.
DBMain This is the interface which defines the data access class A record is never physically deleted from the data file A record number is the logical pointer to the start of a particular record.
 

Class Summary
Data This is the actual data access class.
DataValidator Validates the data and throws exceptions as appropriate.
LockManager Manages locks for database records.
MetaData This singleton is responsible for reading the meta data of the database file.
RecordKeyManager Provides the same record key object and reuses the key.
RoomBooker A helper class that validates and books rooms.
 

Exception Summary
DuplicateKeyException This is thrown whenever a duplicate key is detected.
RecordNotFoundException This exception is thrown whenever a record is not found.
ValidationException This is thrown whenever there is a validation failure.
